title: Pelton and Krawczynski
description:
Zach previews the Western Conference landscape with ESPN's Kevin Pelton on where the Kings fit, and then Jon Krawczynski of The Athletic on the new-look Wolves (43:13). Plus: Important discussions on team nicknames, game-worn jerseys, and most impactful championships. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
